Title: Valid email sign up
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter password | Enter mobile number | Click sign up
Expected: User is redirected to welcome page

Title: Invalid email sign up
Steps: Enter invalid email format | Enter password | Enter mobile number | Click sign up

Title: Password validation check
Steps: Enter password (less than 8 chars) | Enter mobile number | Click sign up

Title: Password validation with incorrect format
Steps: Enter password (less than 8 chars; no uppercase letter) | Enter mobile number | Click sign up

Title: OTP verification
Expected: Account verified and redirected to welcome page

Title: Email already in use
Steps: Enter existing email | Enter password | Enter mobile number | Click sign up

Title: Mobile number already registered
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter password | Enter existing mobile number | Click sign up

Title: Redirect to welcome page after successful signup
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Enter mobile number | Click sign up
Expected: User is redirected to welcome page

Title: Sign up without mobile number
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter password | Leave mobile number field empty | Click sign up

Title: Sign up without password
Steps: Enter valid email | Leave password field empty | Enter mobile number | Click sign up

Title: Sign up with empty fields
Steps: Leave all fields empty | Click sign up
